author: James Joyce
recipient: A. LLEWELYN ROBERTS (Fragment of a letter)
text: Dear Sir In reply to your letter of 4 instant the title of my second book is: Dubliners. I enclose some notices of it and of the first book. An account of the litigation which preceded its publication was published in The Egoist (London) on 15 January 1914. I shall ask the editor to send you a copy of the issue. The result was that the book was published exactly as I wrote it after eight years and four [manuscript breaks off]
